title: I cannot open some image or video files
answer:
The file format is not supported. 

 The image formats supported by default are: *.png, *.gif (static), *.jpg, *.bmp; the audio and video formats supported are: *.mp3, *.wav, *.ogg, *.mid, *.amr, *.mp4 and *.3gp. 

 Other formats such as *.webp and *.wbmp image files and *.awb, *.aac, *.flac, *.mkv and *.webm audio and video files are only supported on some phone models. This depends on the phone's hardware chip platform. If the phone does not support the file format, please download a third-party application that supports the file format. 

 The file is corrupted. 

 Please try again after obtaining the uncorrupted file. 

 The file is copyright-protected. 

 Please try again after obtaining the file access permissions. 

 The battery level is low. 

 Please try again after connecting the charger. 

 Very occasionally, the phone's apps or system may experience an unknown error. 

 You are recommended to restart the app or restart your phone.
keywords: view photos, listen to music, watch videos
